title: Error near line 55, no matter what
body:
I've got an error near line 55 (sometimes it's line 54, sometimes 56). The error doesn't go away, even when commenting the entire block around it.

The error I originally got:

```
/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/runtime.js:202
  throw err;
        ^
Error: export.jade:55
    53|                     span(data-translate-name="copy_text")
    54|                         | Press this button to copy the data to the clipboard, then paste it in a Google Drive Spreadsheet.
  > 55|                 .result-container
    56|                     textarea.result(contenteditable="true", class="export", rows="20")
    57|                 .table-responsive
    58|                     table.result(class="table table-striped table-condensed table-bordered")

Unexpected token `tag` expected `text`, `code`, `:`, `newline` or `eos`
    at Parser.tag (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:805:15)
    at Parser.parseTag (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:736:17)
    at Parser.parseExpr (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:211:21)
    at Parser.block (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:706:25)
    at Parser.tag (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:815:24)
    at Parser.parseTag (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:736:17)
    at Parser.parseExpr (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:211:21)
    at Parser.parseExpr (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:250:21)
    at Parser.block (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:706:25)
    at Parser.tag (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:815:24)
```

The error in commented code:

```
/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/runtime.js:202
  throw err;
        ^
Error: export.jade:56
    54|             //-             | Press this button to copy the data to the clipboard, then paste it in a Google Drive Spreadsheet.
    55|             //-     .result-container
  > 56|             //-         textarea.result(contenteditable="true", class="export", rows="20")
    57|             //-     .table-responsive
    58|             //-         table.result(class="table table-striped table-condensed table-bordered")
    59|         .modal#modal_parse_export(tabindex="-1", role="dialog", data-backdrop="static", data-keyboard="false", data-show="false", aria-hidden="true", aria-labelled-by="mdl_label_parse_export")

Unexpected token `tag` expected `text`, `code`, `:`, `newline` or `eos`
    at Parser.tag (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:805:15)
    at Parser.parseTag (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:736:17)
    at Parser.parseExpr (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:211:21)
    at Parser.block (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:706:25)
    at Parser.tag (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:815:24)
    at Parser.parseTag (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:736:17)
    at Parser.parseExpr (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:211:21)
    at Parser.parseExpr (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:250:21)
    at Parser.block (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:706:25)
    at Parser.tag (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:815:24)
```

When changing a

``` jade
span(lorem=ipsum).
    Some text here
```

into

``` jade
span(lorem=ipsum) Some text here
```

on line 46, the original error moves down one line (to stay on line 55?):

```
/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/runtime.js:202
  throw err;
        ^
Error: export.jade:55
    53|                         | Press this button to copy the data to the clipboard, then paste it in a Google Drive Spreadsheet.
    54|                 .result-container
  > 55|                     textarea.result(contenteditable="true", class="export", rows="20")
    56|                 .table-responsive
    57|                     table.result(class="table table-striped table-condensed table-bordered")
    58|         .modal#modal_parse_export(tabindex="-1", role="dialog", data-backdrop="static", data-keyboard="false", data-show="false", aria-hidden="true", aria-labelled-by="mdl_label_parse_export")

Unexpected token `tag` expected `text`, `code`, `:`, `newline` or `eos`
    at Parser.tag (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:805:15)
    at Parser.parseTag (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:736:17)
    at Parser.parseExpr (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:211:21)
    at Parser.block (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:706:25)
    at Parser.tag (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:815:24)
    at Parser.parseTag (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:736:17)
    at Parser.parseExpr (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:211:21)
    at Parser.parseExpr (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:250:21)
    at Parser.block (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:706:25)
    at Parser.tag (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/jade/lib/parser.js:815:24)
```

The code looks like this:

``` jade

mixin container
    .background
    .container
        block

mixin row
    .row
        .col-sm-10.col-sm-offset-1.col-md-8.col-md-offset-2(class!=attributes.class)
            block

+container
    +row
        // ...
    +row.settings
        // ...
    +row
        h2(data-translate-name="result_title") Result
        p
            button#copy(type="button", class="btn btn-default btn-sm", data-translate-name="copy_button").
                Copy
            span(data-translate-name="copy_text")
                | Press this button to copy the data to the clipboard, then paste it in a Google Drive Spreadsheet.
        .result-container
            textarea.result(contenteditable="true", class="export", rows="20")
        .table-responsive
            table.result(class="table table-striped table-condensed table-bordered")
// modal
```

I tried commenting the entire third `+row` in the commented error above.
